entry.title: Upcoming presentation at FWAV
entry.content: I’m excited to say that some work I’ve been doing with Akiva Bacovcin has been accepted to FWAV. We’ll be presenting on the second day (Thursday, May 19th). Looking forward to it!
entry.summary: I’m excited to say that some work I’ve been doing with Akiva Bacovcin has been accepted to FWAV. We’ll be presenting on the second day (Thursday, May 19th). Looking forward to it!

entry.title: Dissertation materials available on github
entry.content:
The contents of my dissertation, including data, code, and the document itself, are or will be made available on github. The openness and generosity of other researchers made things possible, so I’d like to do my best to follow that example.

I’m currently reorganizing and cleaning things up, but feel free to contact me with any questions or comments!
entry.summary:
The contents of my dissertation, including data, code, and the document itself, are or will be made available on github. The openness and generosity of other researchers made things possible, so I’d like to do my best to follow that example.
I’m currently reorganizing and cleaning things up, but feel free to contact me with any questions or comments!
